cyberAwareness.title: Beware of Fake Income Tax Refund Messages
cyberAwareness.summary: Scammers are sending fake SMS/emails claiming you're eligible for a tax refund.
cyberAwareness.details: The message contains a phishing link asking for your bank and Aadhaar details. The Income Tax Department never asks for sensitive info over SMS or email. Always verify via the official portal.

cyberAwareness.title: Beware of APK Files!
cyberAwareness.summary: #APKfiles are malware that may hack your phone and steal your personal information.
cyberAwareness.details: Only download apps from the official Google Play Store or App Store to ensure your device's safety and avoid malicious threats.

cyberAwareness.title: Instagram Verification Scam
cyberAwareness.summary: Cybercriminals are impersonating Instagram and offering blue tick verification via direct messages.
cyberAwareness.details: These messages redirect users to fake login pages. If credentials are entered, the account is hijacked. Always apply for verification only through the official app settings.

cyberAwareness.title: Free Laptop Scholarship Scam for Students
cyberAwareness.summary: Fake websites are promoting free laptop schemes in the name of government scholarships.
cyberAwareness.details: Users are lured into sharing personal details, including ID proof and OTPs. No such scheme is currently active. Always check on official portals like scholarships.gov.in.

cyberAwareness.title: AI Voice Cloning Fraud
cyberAwareness.summary: Fraudsters are using AI to mimic voices of family members to ask for urgent money transfers.
cyberAwareness.details: Always verify through a video call or alternate number before responding to any urgent request from a known contact. Never share UPI PINs or OTPs blindly.

cyberAwareness.title: Fake Customer Care Numbers on Google
cyberAwareness.summary: Searching for bank or airline customer care numbers may lead you to fake contact listings.
cyberAwareness.details: Scammers list fraudulent numbers and ask for account access, OTPs, or remote control. Visit the official website of the service provider to find contact info.
